courses.title: Full-Stack Web Development
courses.description: Learn to build modern web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

courses.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of AI including machine learning, neural networks, and Python programming.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Create cross-platform mobile apps using React Native, JavaScript, and Firebase backend.

courses.title: Data Science and Analytics
courses.description: Learn data wrangling, visualization, and machine learning using Python, Pandas, and Matplotlib.

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.description: Master the basics of cloud computing and deploy scalable apps on AWS infrastructure.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Essentials
courses.description: Understand the principles of cybersecurity, threats, vulnerabilities, and defensive strategies.

courses.title: DevOps and CI/CD Pipelines
courses.description: Learn how to streamline software delivery using Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and GitHub Actions.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
courses.description: Design beautiful and user-friendly interfaces with Figma, design systems, and usability testing.

courses.title: Blockchain and Web3 Development
courses.description: Build decentralized applications using Ethereum, Solidity, and smart contracts.

courses.title: Python Programming Masterclass
courses.description: Master Python from basics to advanced with hands-on projects, OOP, and real-world apps.
